content: I was raised in a lodge in Augsburg , Germany in 1967. It was located in either Flak kaserne or Sheridan kaserne. If anyone remembers what lodge this was please send me all the info you have. Thanks in advance. CDR Mike Clark, USCG e-mail: mikeaclark@sbcglobal.net

title: Lodge help needed
